description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Battle your enemies throughout the galaxy with Neutrino Wars, the ultimate low-gravity space duel!  With 8 levels, two weapons and a choice of ship colour, the retro gameplay will have you and your friends hooked! Who will be the champion?
